SELECT CTN, TRANSACTION_DT, CANCEL_NOTIFICATION_DT, TOTAL, ITEMNAME, MERCHANTNAME FROM TB_AUTH_INFO WHERE 1 = 1
AND CTN = #{ctn}
AND TRANSACTION_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate} || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate} || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
ORDER BY TRANSACTION_DT
